programme.title: Between Maybes
programme.desc: Amidst the silence and isolation, Hazel and Louie find comfort in each other as they both needed it at that certain point in their lives. programme.title: Libingan Ng Mga Buhay
programme.desc: This is the true story of Rodolfo Fuentes who was unjustly sent to jail at the very young age of 14.

programme.title: Darna, Ang Pagbabalik (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: While trying to find her grandmother and little brother, Ding, Narda is viciously struck in the head and the stone that furnishes her power is stolen. Before the inevitable face-off with Valentina, Darna gains a new ally when she helps police lieutenant Max Ablan.

programme.title: Batang Lansangan
programme.desc: Simple as his dreams would be, Ronnie Ricketts is a typical auto mechanic who wants only a peaceful and plain life. But no matter how he tried to live the life he desires, still the rotten elements of the society keep running after him.

programme.title: Aso't Pusa (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Pamboy (Tito Sotto) risked being beaten to a pulp by Osang's father each time he came to defend the girl. He tried to convince to leave, but Osang (Aiza Seguerra) continued to show her love for her father even after he went into jail.

programme.title: Cuadro De Jack
programme.desc: Young comedians Nino, Keempee, Dennis and Smokey starred in this 90's remake of a blockbuster hit. The Filipino version of the cowboy and Indians war made all the more appealing by the laugh-filled sequences featuring the inept, but trying hard bunch of heroes.

programme.title: Palabra De Honor (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Eddie Garcia headed this all-star cast in a searing drama about a millionaire patriarch and the power he wielded among the people in an entire town.

programme.title: Psycho Sex Killer
programme.desc: A serial killer is on the loose. And the victims have one thing in common --- they are all in the care of the same psychiatrist.

programme.title: Starlet
programme.desc: The story tells of an obedient daughter who,out of necessity,must do something to save the life of her ailing mother.

programme.title: Rocky N Rolly
programme.desc: The swindling trio of Rolly, Alex and Cleto earn big bucks by using different disguises to fool people. They soon join forces with ex-boxer, Rocky, who quit the sport after syndicate hench men beat him up for refusing him to join the game.

programme.title: Sa Hirap at Ginhawa (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: In the story, a young couple eloped, got married and then must cope with problems like money, living on their own, trying to finish school and raising a baby.

programme.title: Imortal (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Imortal refers to a love so great and so enduring, it defied conventions, tragedy and even the limitations of time.

programme.title: Pieta 2
programme.desc: Rigor (Ace Vergel) dies but in Marta's fear that Noel (Bong Revilla Jr) might turn out like his amoral father, she raises her son with an iron hand.

programme.title: Silakbo
programme.desc: A killer-rapist was on the prowl and all of the victims seemed to have had some sort of connection with the maverick NBI agent, Andy, played by Cesar Montano.

programme.title: Andrew Ford Medina ('Wag Kang Gamol!)
programme.desc: Andrewford Medina (Andrew E) and Jinglebert (Dennis Padilla) do odd jobs for a hotel. Andrew joins a rap competition where Gilbert challenges aspiring rappers and shows his idol who the real king of rap is.

programme.title: Oo Na Sige Na
programme.desc: When their relationship was discovered, Shirley was made to choose between father and boyfriend,Bonggoy.

programme.title: Ober Da Bakod 2 (Da Treasure Adbentyur)
programme.desc: The Dineros and the Dayukdoks, were off on a treasure hunt where they met the crazy professor Hannibal, a forgetful ghost, a tribe of midgets, a troop of sexy women from the moon and other fantasy figures.

programme.title: Bridesmaids
programme.desc: This is the story of four women in the glamorous world of fashion, about their friendships, their loves, and their careers.

programme.title: Tag-Araw, Tag-Ulan
programme.desc: A woman who was running away from the pain of a broken love affair. A young man who was looking forward to a fun-filled summer and his first sex experience.

programme.title: Marami Ka Pang Kakaining Bigas
programme.desc: Eddie Garcia played a veteran cop who rose from the ranks and who survived by his wits. Joko Diaz, on the other hand, was a young graduate from the police academy who did everything by the book.

programme.title: Sambahin Mo Ang Katawan Ko
programme.desc: A mysterious girl descends on a fishing village and stirs up a storm by carrying on with two of the village's most coveted bachelors --- an engaged playboy and a rich seminarian.

programme.title: Vizconde Massacre 2
programme.desc: Carlo J. Caparas, master of the massacre film took another look at the Vizconde rape and murder case with this film.

programme.title: Friends in Love (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Set in the sprawling campus of Brent School in scenic Baguio City, young stars Sharon, William, Jackie Lou and Rowell played a game of romantic musical chairs in this heartwarming story. Opposites attract and they were all faced with the difficulty of adjusting to the differences in their personalities.

programme.title: Habang May Buhay
programme.desc: Pia found herself in the same predicament as her mother did years ago. During that time, Zeny gave up her true love to marry a man whom her parents preferred. This time around Pia was engaged to Jonathan although she was in love with Gary.

programme.title: Pita, Terror Ng Kalookan
programme.desc: Pita witnessed the murder of his favorite brother and vowed to take revenge. He did, and was jailed for his vendetta.

programme.title: Paraaque Bank Robbery
programme.desc: There was a robbery in the bank where Joselito Joseco was employed and having adapted the guts and bravery of his idol, he was able to save the loot and shoot down the robbers.
